cards.rules_text: Whenever another creature you control enters the battlefield or dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The followers of Stendar call us murderers. I say we're doing them a service.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
If you would draw a card, you draw two cards, lose 2 life, and put a quest counter on Hermaeus Mora, Lorekeeper instead.
Remove X quest counters from Hermaeus Mora: Put a nonland card you own with mana value X from outside the game into your hand. You lose X life.

Target player discards a card.
{1}{B}{B}: Put Nightmare Crypt from your graveyard onto the battlefield transformed. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

If Risen Draugr would die, exile it instead.

cards.rules_text:
Thu'um [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Dragon you control and each Dragon card in your graveyard. This card is a Dragon.)[/i]
Put target non-Dragon permanent on top of its owner's library.

Acquire a perk, then target opponent looks at the top four cards of your library and separates them into a face-down pile and a face-up pile. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. If you spent your perks this turn, you may put both into your hand instead. [i](You get a perk counter, then you may spend them if you have 3 or more.)[/i]

Reach [i](This creature can block creatures with flying.)[/i]
[i]Ferocious[/i] — When Apprentice Archer enters the battlefield, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

Whenever you spend your perks, Beast of Tribute gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
{1}{G}, Discard Beast of Tribute: Acquire a perk. [i](You get a perk counter, then you may spend them if you have 3 or more.)[/i]

When Envoy of Autumn enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a land. If you do, search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
[i]Ferocious[/i] — Envoy of Autumn enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

Whenever a player discards a card for the first time each turn, you draw a card and lose 1 life.

As long as there are three or more quest counters on World Eater's Eyrie, creatures you control can't be blocked by more than one creature.

—Mjoll the Lioness[/i]

cards.rules_text: Mill four cards. You may put a nonland card from among the milled cards into your hand.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Exploring these caves feels like coming home. I missed this.”
—Mjoll the Lioness[/i]

cards.rules_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. It deals damage equal to its power to up to one other target creature or planeswalker.
Return up to one target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The destruction of Whiterun's western tower marked a dark turning point in Skyrim's fate.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever Crypt Excavator or another Elf enters the battlefield under your control, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard. If that card was a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target Elf you control. Otherwise, you may put a land card from you hand onto the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Another draugr filled den... One day, I want to find a cave of sweetrolls.”[/i]
cards.notes: Look at the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card with power 4 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

cards.rules_text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}, Tap an untapped artifact or creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast Dragon spells.
 {T}: Add {C}.
{20}, {T}, Sacrifice Shrine to Talos: Cast any number of Dragon cards you own in your graveyard and/or from outside the game without paying their mana costs.
Flying

Flying, vigilance
Whenever Paarthurnax the Mentor enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.
Discard two cards: Choose one—
• Spells target player casts this turn cost {1} less to cast.
• Spells target player casts this turn cost {1} more to cast.

Menace
If a card or token would be put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
{3}{U}{R}, Sacrifice a creature: Transform Miraak, First Dragonborn. Activate this ability only during your turn.
cards.rules_text2:
Menace
When this permanent transforms into Miraak Ascendant, exile the top three cards of each player's library.
You may play cards exiled with Miraak.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]“Fate decreed that you had to die so that I could win my freedom.”[/i]

cards.special_text:
If a source would deal damage to you or an Amil planeswalker you control, prevent 1 of that damage.
[+1]: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain vigilance until end of turn.
[-7]: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put a creature card with power 4 or greater from among them onto the battlefield and the rest into your graveyard.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Morag Tong Agent this turn dies, create a Clue token. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
Sacrifice two Clues: Return Morag Tong Agent from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“What remains of our order lies here on Solstheim. We are forgotten, but not gone.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from black.
Whenever equipped creature and one other creature attack, draw a card.
Damage dealt by equipped creatures you control can't be prevented.
Equip {2}

Equipment spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate.

Whenever a player mills one or more cards, exile a card from among the milled cards.
{T}, Put a card exiled with M'aiq into its owner's graveyard: The owner of target nonland permanent with mana value equal to the exiled card's mana value puts that permanent on the top or bottom of its owner's library.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Some say Alduin is Akatosh. Some say M'aiq is a Liar. Don't you believe either of those things.”[/i]
cards.notes:
Whenever one or more cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere for the first time each turn, you gain that much life.
T: Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.

cards.rules_text: Spells that target noncreature spells you control cost {2} more to cast.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“You were given this gift by the gods for a reason. It is up to you to figure out how best to use it.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Bandit Profiteer enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I get them coin, they tell me I'd make a fine rug. It's a fun game we play.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Other non-Human creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Ulfric, why so hostile? After all, it's not the Thalmor that's burning your farms and killing your sons.”
—Ambassador Elenwen[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Arboreal Sanctifier enters the battlefield, gain control of target land for as long as you control Arboreal Sanctifier.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“This land reeks of Talos worship. Why they would send me to this backwater province is beyond me.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature card in your graveyard, except its a white Spirit creature in addition to its other colors and types, has base power and toughness 1/1, and has flying.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Necromancy, as any other type of magic, is a tool to be used.”
—Phinis Gestor[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Equipment you control.
Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has hexproof.
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, scry 1.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, defending player loses 2 life.
Whenever you discard a card for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Dawnguard Warrior.
Whenever another creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We Argonians do the work the Nords don't want to do.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever Hold Guard attacks, if you control the creature with the greatest power or tied for greatest, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever you cast a spell that targets College Student, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
Whenever a player discards a card, Volkihar Nightstalker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
When Crypt Ravager dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.
Target creature gains deathtouch and indestructible until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“It's all right. I will not shun you for what you are. Stay. I will tell you everything you have forgotten.”
—Namira[/i]

cards.special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I — Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
II — Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
III — For each permanent type, you may put a card of that type from your hand onto the battlefield.

cards.rules_text: Defender
Track your perk counters here.

cards.special_text:
I — Gain control of target creature and untap it. That creature gains haste.
II — You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. It gains haste.
III — Exile each creature you control. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
